import React from 'react'; import { Table, Button, Alert } from 'react-bootstrap'; const SchedulesTable = ({ schedules = [], onDeleteSchedule }) => (
All Schedules
{schedules.length === 0 ? ( No schedules found. ) : ( {schedules.map(s => ( ))}
Email Program Start Date End Date Status Actions
{s.email} {s.program_title || s.program_id} {s.start_date} {s.end_date} {s.is_finished ? 'Finished' : 'Active'}
)}
); export default SchedulesTable;
